attributes.action: WHERE HAVE ALL THE MANNERS GONE
attributes.additional_details:
1 Children need to be taught to say please thankyou
exsuse me because like my dad always says manners
cost nothing.
2 To treat people like they want to be treated themsevles.
3 People should not  be embarrassed  to say sorry if they are in the wrong.
4 children should be taught to talk more to one another
face to face and not mobile phones where they texted
badly spelted word s.
5 Parents need get on top of bad    behaviour  when the
children are young and easier to control.
6 children need to be taugh to speak the queens english and not slang.
7 Parents need to be able to spend mone time with the
children when there young.
